LanguageData.ARA_Hostile_Hive.label: Arachne Corps/Kasu
LanguageData.ARA_Hostile_Hive.description: The Arachne Insect Fleet that attempted to invade Glitterworld was destroyed by the Glitterworld Allied Forces.After that, the insect swarm population left behind within the star area was still active.Since these insect swarm offspring lost the connection with the hive network, the anomalous network that they had autonomously formed was Possessing only low intelligence and acting like beasts, they remain dangerous foes, their genetic reflexes carved through thousands of battles still undulled.\n\nThey will show no mercy to any being, even their own kind.
